<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>w.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I never stated that I heard *live* voices, and less while in KY meditation.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I really think that it was the voice of my subconscious mind that was materialized and caught by my cell. Cause in that very day I was mad at myself and in my mind I said "stupid, stupid, stupid" to myself, so I really think that I just recorded my own subconscious voice, so I was laughing at it.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Neli</DIV></td></tr></table><br>
